column4: plz someone knows how to start ubuntu without unity, and use gnome instead?
which version of ubuntu are you running ?
ive got oneiric (11.10)
in that case, there isn't gnome2 anymore. If you don't like unity, you can try gnome-shell or another desktop environment (kde, xfce, lxde...)
ok, then i'll return to 10.04, thanx !
but, unity and gnome3 are the same???
whats the difference???
oh, i know, but how can i return to gnome2 in 11.10??
ok!!!
thanx
you can't
ok
gnome 3 "gnome-shell" is like gnome2 ui??
oh, then its like unity 2d, right?
but in my version it shows only "Unity" and "Unity 2d"
there is no classic mode :(

gnome-shell is very different from both gnome2 and unity. The only way to get a gnome2-like interface on oneiric is to use gnome-panel+gnome-session-fallback (but it won't have as many functionalities as gnome-panel in gnome2 and is only intended as a fallback)
yes, then i use ubuntu 11.04 with Classic mode??
ok
you can. But keep in mind that gnome2 is heading to the end of its life
